verbs.description: [ARG1: slight changes] [V: planned] [ARG1: for final phase of colonie senior living complex] the developer of shaker pointe at carondelet is looking to make minor changes to plans for the latest phase of the senior community the next construction stage will include 35 moderate income one - and two - bedroom apartments adding one apartment more than originally planned and bringing the total number of residences at shaker pointe to 198 units shaker pointe colonie planning and economic development department colonie latham joe lacivita
